meta.title: Aaron Edmiston's Portfolio
meta.description: Full-Stack Software Engineer II with 4+ years of experience building scalable SaaS solutions. Led feature development that boosted user retention by 25% and contributed to 165% ARR growth.

intro.name: Aaron Edmiston
intro.experience: , a Full-Stack Software Engineer with over 4 years of professional experience building scalable SaaS solutions.
intro.focus: I specialize in full-stack development, using
intro.technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, GraphQL, and MySQL.
intro.description: I've led feature development that boosted user retention by 25%, migrated 8,000+ lines of code to TypeScript, and contributed to 165% ARR growth. I'm passionate about building exceptional digital experiences and mentoring the next generation of developers.

about.title: About
about.description1: While pursuing dual degrees in Marketing and International Business Studies at California State University Long Beach, I delved into a world of real-world experiences that shaped my current outlook. These adventures truly built my foundations, adding depth to both my work and life outside the code editor. Even back then, I had an inkling that mixing coding with a splash of adventure and creativity would be my sweet spot.
about.description2: Fast forward to today—I'm a Full-Stack Software Engineer II at Rotaready, where I've led critical feature development, migrated our entire front-end codebase to TypeScript, and contributed to 165% ARR growth post-acquisition. Beyond engineering, I've contributed to project management, design, client support, and marketing, demonstrating versatility in startup environments. I'm also currently serving as Board President for a cooperative housing corporation, leading community initiatives and governance. When I'm not coding, I'm plunging into the depths of the ocean exploring reefs, or mentoring developers through programs like Meet a Mentor (MaM). With experiences in 60+ countries and a year living the nomad life, each adventure continues to fuel my passion for tech and creativity.

dashboard.title: Rotaready Dashboard
dashboard.description: The Dashboard required meticulous planning, hands-on execution, multiple iterations, and a significant learning curve, particularly with React Grid Layout and other cutting-edge technologies. It became a powerful tool for our users, offering a highly customizable, responsive, and visually appealing interface.

eventPlanner.title: Rotaready Events
eventPlanner.description: I spearheaded the development of the Event Planner for Rotaready. I customized React Big Calendar and used GraphQL for precise data retrieval. Through diligent handling of edge cases, I ensured a seamless user experience, resulting in a visually appealing and fully functional planner.

nomader.title: Nomader
nomader.description: Nomader was a full-stack web application that allows users to search for and save their favorite travel destinations. It used Skyscanner's API to find the cheapest flights and users local currency to their destination.

loopai.title: LooP AI
loopai.description: Built a full-stack AI assistant that helps users plan events, manage guest lists, and send SMS updates. Leveraged LLMs, Supabase, and Twilio to generate structured invitations, automate guest messaging, and support profile/guest search. Designed a fuzzy matching system with PostgreSQL trigram indexing, similar to enterprise-scale name/entity resolution. Iterated rapidly from concept → prototype → working product.

tak.title: Time and Attendance Kiosk
tak.description: Developed and shipped a production monorepo for attendance tracking using TurboRepo, Docker, and PostgreSQL. Streamlined development with Husky, lint-staged, Prettier, and standardized tooling for a robust, reproducible workflow.

rotaready.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer II
rotaready.description: Led research and development of Time and Attendance Kiosk app using Next.js, reducing startup costs by 5%. Enhanced Client Resource Management with advanced search functionality, expediting customer onboarding. Designed and launched critical features including dashboard, events calendar, HR tables, and rota editor, boosting user retention by 25% and nearly tripling client base. Led front-end TypeScript migration of 8,000+ lines of code, reducing bugs and accelerating development by 8%. Contributed to 165% ARR growth post-acquisition and onboarded five new engineers.

absoluteMagnitude.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer & Project Manager
absoluteMagnitude.description: Delivered 5+ high-quality client solutions over 10 months with 100% client satisfaction. Led and coordinated team of backend developer and designer to craft 5 major React-based projects, met all deadlines, and received commendations for exceptional client communication.

nomader.title: Full Stack Software Developer
nomader.description: Conceptualized, developed, and deployed a travel and booking platform leveraging Amadeus' open-source API, improving booking speeds by 5%. Built full-stack application with React, Node.js, Express, and MySQL.

bootcamp.title: Full Stack Software Engineering
bootcamp.description: Eight-month intensive full-stack software engineering bootcamp. Won an 8-hour hackathon by building CubClub, a web app designed to make children's learning interactive and fun. Curated a code-pairing supplemental program using an algorithm to pair students weekly.
